channel.title: If you may, please help. Appreciate it
channel.description: I'm a long time member on here, but I have just recenly started getting into development, how come when I press "run" file my client won't start? how can I fix this. I do not get any errors, it says the system cannot find the path specified. @echo off TITLE Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client highmem pause

item.title: If you may, please help. Appreciate it
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You need to set your environment variables.

Read full topic
item.source: If you may, please help. Appreciate it

item.title: If you may, please help. Appreciate it

item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

You need to change the “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java.exe” to your correct java

item.title: If you may, please help. Appreciate it
item.dc:creator: @warrior_lo1 warrior lo1
item.description:
@warrior_lo1 wrote:

I’m a long time member on here, but I have just recenly started getting into development, how come when I press “run” file my client won’t start? how can I fix this. I do not get any errors, it says the system cannot find the path specified.
@echo off
TITLE Run
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m client highmem
pause

Read full topic
item.source: If you may, please help. Appreciate it
